description: Set the sound to use when the siren is enabled. (This doesn't enable the siren)

entity_id.description: Name(s) of the entities to set.

tone.description: The tone to use for the chime. One of ["doorbell", "fur_elise", "doorbell_extended", "alert", "william_tell", "rondo_alla_turca", "police_siren", "evacuation", "beep_beep", "beep", "inactive"]
